"Weapon proficiency takes daily practice.
The more training you do, the more you'll improve."

"You may find it hard and exhausting at first, but
the more boot camps you complete, the more
you'll start to enjoy the process."

"I've sent out countless
students like that.
So just put your mind at ease and follow me."

"This is an explanation of the twin machine gun gear system.

By learning the \"twin machine guns\" skill, a gear gauge
will be added to the top of the Weapon Palette.

The gear gauge will charge when
landing attacks with twin machine guns."

"Attack power increases when the gear gauge is full.

The gauge for the twin machine guns will decrease over
time, so you should keep your attacks continuous.
Also, the gauge will decrease when you receive damage,
and since the gauge will disappear when empty, pay close attention."
